text:
Joining @TheHillEvents this afternoon for an important discussion about the #opioidcrisis and criminal justice system.

We can’t prosecute our way out of this overdose epidemic. We need an all-of-the-above approach to tackle illicit opioids and help those battling addiction. https://t.co/iSpOjzaswb

Proud to support this important @AADskin briefing during #SkinCancerAwarenessMonth. I’ll never forget the moment when I was diagnosed with melanoma. My top priority as the Co-Chair of the Skin Cancer Caucus is to help encourage critical protection and prevention efforts. https://t.co/gMZsm1MgyM

Yesterday, as the national average gas price hit another all-time high of $4.57, my Democratic colleagues blocked the American Energy Independence from Russia Act.

That's 6⃣ times they've killed a bill to lower gas prices and boost energy exports to counter Russian aggression...

Tomorrow morning, my district team will host mobile office hours at the Willoughby Senior Center. They can assist if you are having issues with federal agencies, take down your concerns on federal issues, and discuss other services offered by our office. Be sure to stop by! https://t.co/TxiYLI8S6g
Excited to have two young Northeast Ohioans start their internships with my office this week. Welcome to the team, Madison and Brady! https://t.co/zrF4qU22Dr
And @POTUS is still planning on repealing #Title42 in six days… https://t.co/hAazviShY7

Our brave men and women in blue risk their lives to protect us. I’m proud to support them not just during #NationalPoliceWeek but every day. Please join me in recognizing Ohio's law enforcement officers and honoring those who made the ultimate sacrifice in the line of duty. https://t.co/djF6Mp8Ysg

64% of the US population is living paycheck-to-paycheck and #inflation remains at a 40-year high.

@POTUS and the Democratic majorities in Congress must abandon their tax-and-spend agenda and prioritize the needs of working families and everyday Americans. https://t.co/PZz8GW7VQo
Great to visit with Berkshire Junior High School’s 8th grade class today on the Capitol steps! https://t.co/kXeL69VquM
